results.name: Amazon
results.known_limitations: Due to platform integration with myADP, myADP platform limitation is inherited and Historical Payouts data is limited to 3 years per employment.

results.name: Grubhub Driver
results.known_limitations: Due to platform limitations, only 2 months of historical Gig data is available.

results.name: Instacart Shopper
results.known_limitations:
Due to the Instacart appâ€™s lack of concurrent session support, when a user connects their Instacart account via Argyle Link or when Argyle re-scans a connected account, the user is signed out of the Instacart app. To reduce the chances of a user being signed out while using the app, Instacart accounts are re-scanned every 24 hours between 0600 and 1200 UTC.
In addition, Instacart prevents Direct Deposit updates for 60 minutes after a user connects their account. For this reason we recommend a two-stage user flow to perform a DDS update: 1) asking the user to connect their account, 2) 60+ minutes later prompting them to return to confirm their new DDS settings. During this interim users should not sign in to their Instacart account outside of Argyle Link.

results.name: Uber Driver
results.known_limitations:
Uber only makes the last 2 digits of SSN available. The rest is obfuscated.

Rental Car data may not be available
results.status_details: We have identified issues with the underlying platform. We are actively investigating and will provide an update by May 15, 10:00 UTC at the latest.

results.name: USPS
results.known_limitations:
After January 15, 2023, employees are required to perform a one-time reset to their Self-Service Profile (SSP) password and set up Multifactor Authentication (MFA) to access LiteBlue.

Due to platform limitations, data refresh requires user re-authentication.
Due to platform limitations, only the last 41 Paystubs are available. This corresponds to approximately 1.5 years of historical paystub information.

results.name: Walmart
results.known_limitations:
Walmart platform exhibits unpredictable stability issues which result in partial data retrieval. In such circumstances, user re-authentication is recommended.

Due to platform limitations, unsuccessful authentication attempts, whether due to invalid credentials or misconfigured MFA, will result in MFA not configured error being displayed to the user.

Argyle does not retrieve Walmart data that is older than 5 years.
